alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 1:44PM MDT until March 30 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...East Slopes Park and Northern Gore Ranges, Gore Pass, Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to midnight MDT Tuesday night. Heaviest snow likely from late morning through the afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous, especially through mountain passes. Use caution when traveling.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
